reporter_caption.center: STATE v. R.I. BROTHERHOOD OF CORRECTIONAL OFFICERS, 421 A.2d 555 (R.I. 1980)

caption.center: STATE v. RHODE ISLAND BROTHERHOOD OF CORRECTIONAL OFFICERS et al.

opinion.attorneys:
Thomas J. McAndrew, Special Counsel, State of Rhode Island, Providence, for plaintiff.
Cobleigh, Higgins Fleury, Gerard P. Cobleigh, Warwick, for defendants.
opinion.opinion_text: [1] ORDER [2] The Rhode Island Brotherhood of Correctional Officers' motion to dismiss is assigned to the motion calendar for Friday, October 10, 1980 at 9:30 a.m. for oral argument.
